title: The AI Doomers Are Having Their Moment
description: OpenAI and other AI companies have attracted billions in the race to develop artificial general intelligence. It might be further away then we think.
content:

title: How AI will cut staff and reshape offices
description: Design firm Hassell’s latest global survey shows 63 per cent of tasks for which people use artificial intelligence would otherwise be done at workstations.
content: Employers will need fewer workstations as the use of artificial intelligence replaces desk-based jobs and offices will increasingly become places where people gather to share information and meet in person, design firm Hassell’s latest global survey ... [280 chars]

title: Reasoning AI: Cracking the IIT test is a giant leap for machine-kind
description: Recently, Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro topped India’s IIT Joint Entrance Examination. Artificial intelligence (AI) has clearly leapt beyond mimicking patterns and can now be used in fields where reasoning is crucial.
content: When ChatGPT first appeared in late 2022, it could charm us with words but stumbled with numbers. It could draft a sonnet in the style of Shakespeare but might guess wildly if asked to multiply 17 by 24. Two years plus later, the tables have turned. ... [5367 chars]

title: 'New weapon of choice': Australians are reporting fewer scams - but losing more
description: Australians are being urged to remain alert to "emerging" scam threats powered by artificial intelligence — from voice cloning to deepfake videos.
content:
Australians are reporting fewer scams in 2025, but are losing more money as a result of them.

title: AI can provide a second career for retirees
